name: Tripping Balls
description:
Welcome to Tripping balls. As the title might suggest, you're about to have your SHIT ROCKED. 

Remember classical ping pong games from the early days of gaming? Remember all that weed you smoked at the same time? WANT THAT EXPERIENCE AGAIN?

Tripping balls is all you need, and at 60p, it's cheaper than a bag of weed.

Tripping Balls, better than weed.

Read the Review HERE
